org.drombler.acp.startup.main

Class DromblerACPStarter<T extends DromblerACPConfiguration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drombler.commons.client.startup.main.DromblerClientStarter<T>
      • org.drombler.acp.startup.main.DromblerACPStarter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the configuration type

    public class DromblerACPStarter<T extends DromblerACPConfiguration>
extends org.drombler.commons.client.startup.main.DromblerClientStarter<T>
    The Drombler ACP starter makes sure all registered BootServiceStarters gets started with special support to start the OSGi framework.
    Author:
    puce
